interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " November 1st " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " The Collector " .
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Have less than 60 Ami Lust before The Collector begins the Event-Chain. Replaced by Bucket, Bucket, Lovely Old Bucket

progression.synopsis: Ami returns to Sensei , informing him about the Nakayama's presents for him . After cooing over how nice it is to have time between them be uninterrupted, she places down his dinner and prepares to feed him.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.36.
